   // Minted namespace
      if (typeof M == "undefined") {
        M = {};
      }
      M.LOG_MODULE_VIEW = "minted.web.views.browse.kitten:homepage";

      

      M.img_src = function(path) {
        var s3_host = "https://static-awsblue-prodxenial.minted.com";
        var s3_host_https = "https://static-awsblue-prodxenial.minted.com";
        var s3_folder = "c92ecd4f";
        var version = "_xnedLyaF4";
        if (!s3_host || !s3_host_https || !s3_folder || !version) {
          return path;
        }
        if (window.location.protocol == "https:") {
          s3_host = s3_host_https;
        }
        path = path.replace(/^[\/\/]/, '');
        return s3_host + '/assets/' + s3_folder + '/' + path + '?v=' + version;
      };

      var MINTEDCDN_HTTP_HOST = "cdn3.minted.com";

        var CDN_VERSION = "_xnedLyaF4";

      M.MINTEDCDN_HTTP_HOST = "cdn3.minted.com";

      M.MINTEDCDN_HTTPS_HOST = "mintedcdn.global.ssl.fastly.net";

      M.PHOTOUPLOAD_ENDPOINT = "photoupload-awsblue-prodxenial.mntd.net";

      M.PHOTO_S3_BUCKET = "minted.img.archive.prod";

      M.RECAPTCHA_SITE_KEY = "6LcpH8sZAAAAAFswy5LTpZtS22bwKVUA7aMuBZb5";

      M.BASE_URL = "https://www.minted.com";

      M.SSL_BASE_URL = "https://www.minted.com";

      M.APP_MODE = "production";

      M.DEVICE_TYPE = "desktop";

        M.IS_MOBILE = false;

        M.IS_MOBILE_OPTIMIZED = false;

        M.DI_IS_ENABLED = true;

        M.BABY_GATE_ENABLED = true;

      

  $(document).ready(function() {
    try {
      var vCookieFilter = function(cookie) { return cookie.match(/^v=(.+)$/); };
      var vCookieArray = document.cookie.toString()
      .split(' ')
      .filter(vCookieFilter);
      var vCookieString = vCookieArray[0].substring(2);
      newrelic.addPageAction('captureVisitor', {
        unvalidated_v_cookie: vCookieString,
      });
    } catch(error) {
      // Do nothing.
    }
  });
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   <!--//--><![CDATA[//><!
      M.static_url_rewrite = function(path) {
        return "https://static-awsblue-prodxenial.minted.com/assets/c92ecd4f?v=_xnedLyaF4" + path;
      };

      

      $(document).ready(function() {
        
  M.displayRecentBlogPosts();

        
  M.loggedInUser = new M.Model.Base.LoggedInUser();
  M.currentUser = M.currentUser || {};

  $.get('/logged_in_user', function(loginStatus) {
    try {
      newrelic.setCustomAttribute('user_id', String(loginStatus.userId));
      newrelic.setCustomAttribute('visitor_id', loginStatus.visitorId);
    }
    catch(error) {
      // Do nothing
    }

    M.loggedInUser.set({
      firstName: loginStatus.firstName,
      userId: loginStatus.userId,
      isDesigner: loginStatus.isDesigner,
      email: loginStatus.email
    });
    var userNav = new M.View.Base.UserNav({
      model: M.loggedInUser,
      DiIsEnabled: true
    });
    userNav.render();

    M.currentUser.uid = loginStatus.userId;
    M.currentUser.new_customer_status = 1;

    var orderEl = $('.notificationBarDark');
    if (orderEl.is(':visible') && !M.IS_MOBILE) {
      var orderNotifsModel = new M.Model.Order.OrderStatus({
        userModel: M.loggedInUser,
        isVisitor: !!loginStatus.visitorId,
      });
      var orderNotifs = new M.View.Order.OrderStatus({
        model: orderNotifsModel,
        el: orderEl,
      });
    }
  });

  // Create account creation pixel, customer_id is stored in the cookie
  var newUserAccountId = $.cookie("newUserAccountId");
  if (newUserAccountId) {
    var yellowhammerAccountCreationPixelUrl = "https://jump.omnitarget.com/tr649693?" +
        "customer_id=" + encodeURIComponent(newUserAccountId);

    var yellowhammerPixelAttributes = {
        "width" : 1,
        "height" : 1,
        "scrolling" : "no",
        "frameborder" : "0"};

    M.CreateTrackingPixel(yellowhammerAccountCreationPixelUrl,
        "<iframe>",
        yellowhammerPixelAttributes);

    // reset newUserAccoutId cookie
    $.cookie("newUserAccountId",null);
  }

      });
    //--><!]]>
  </script>

  </script>
 </head>

        .hp-tiled h2 {
            max-width: 87.5vw;
            font-size: 8vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled h3 {
            font-size: 3.5vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled h4 {
            font-size: 4vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled p {
            font-size: 4vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled p.big {
            font-size: 5.5vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled .m-no,
        .hp-tiled .d-img,
        .hp-tiled br.m-no {
            display: none;
        }
        .hp-tiled .d-no,
        .hp-tiled .m-img,
        .hp-tiled br.d-no {
            display: block;
        }
        .hp-tiled .m-img {
            display: block;
        }
        .hp-tiled .peachbar {
            width: 100%;
            margin: -1vw auto 0;
        }
        .hp-tiled .peachbar p {
            padding: 4vw 0;
            margin: 0 auto;
            max-width: none;
        }
        .hp-tiled .green-bar {
            margin: -0.5vw auto 0;
            padding: 3vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled .green-bar .small {
            font-size: 87.5%;
            margin-right: 2vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled .green-bar p {
            font-size: 4vw;
        }

        .hp-tiled .tiles {
            margin: 3vw 0;
            grid-gap: 6vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled .tile {
            max-width: 100vw;
        }
        .hp-tiled .tiles-1 {
            grid-template-columns: 100vw;
            -ms-grid-columns: 100vw;
            grid-template-rows: auto;
            -ms-grid-rows: auto 6vw auto 6vw auto 6vw auto 6vw auto 6vw auto 6vw auto 6vw auto;
            width: 100%;
            max-width: 100vw;
        }
    
        .hp-tiled .tile-a {
            grid-area: 1/1/2/2;
            -ms-grid-row: 1; -ms-grid-row-span: 1; -ms-grid-column: 1; -ms-grid-column-span: 1;

            max-width: 100%;
        }

            display: none;

            <section class="hp-tiled">
             <section class="sector how-it-works">
              <div class="h-split">
               <div class="half-1-2 image-half">
                <img alt="Paper Dahlia at work" src="https://cdn3.minted.com/files/content/minted_landing_banners/20ART0069OHP_0331_TogetherAtHome_Event_Homepage_Desktop_MintedArtist_OP.jpg"/>
               </div>
               <div class="half-2-1 content-half">
                <div class="pane">
                 <h2>
                  How it works
                 </h2>
                 <p>
                  Our Design Challenge is where customers and artists vote on the best work to bring to you. The benefits are many: You get exclusive fresh designs, and artists thrive in our uniquely supportive creative community.
                 </p>
                 <p class="cta">
                  <a href="/design-vote">
                   Vote
                  </a>
                  |
                  <a href="/participate/overview">
                   Participate
                  </a>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>

           <style>

            .gift-cards {
        display: block;

        margin: 3rem auto 6rem;
    }
    .gift-cards h2 {
        font-size: 1.875rem;
    }

        font-size: 1.25rem;
        margin-top: 0;
    }

        margin-bottom: 0;
    }
    .gift-cards p.cta a {
        font-size: 1rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: #333;
    }

    .gift-cards .h-split {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .gift-cards .h-split .half,
    .gift-cards .h-split .half.image-half img {
        width: 28.75rem;
        height: auto;
    }
    .gift-cards .h-split .one-third,
    .gift-cards .h-split .one-third.image-half img {
        width: 20rem;
        height: auto;
    }
    .gift-cards .h-split .two-thirds,
    .gift-cards .h-split .two-thirds.image-half img {
        width: 37.5rem;
        height: auto;
    }

    @media only screen and (max-width: 60rem) {
        .gift-cards {
            max-width: 87.5vw;
            margin: 8vw auto 12vw;
        }
        .gift-cards h2 {
            font-size: 7.5vw;
        }
        .gift-cards p.big {
            font-size: 5vw;
        }
        .gift-cards p.cta a {
            font-size: 3.5vw;
        }

        .gift-cards .h-split {
            flex-direction: column;
        }
        .gift-cards .h-split .one-third,
        .gift-cards .h-split .two-thirds,
        .gift-cards .h-split .half,
        .gift-cards .h-split .one-third.image-half img,
        .gift-cards .h-split .two-thirds.image-half img,
        .gift-cards .h-split .half.image-half img {
            width: 87.5vw;
        }
        .gift-cards .h-split .one-third,
        .gift-cards .h-split .two-thirds,
        .gift-cards .h-split .half {
            margin: 3vw auto;
        }

           <div class="drupal-html">
            <section class="minty-hp gift-cards">
             <div class="h-split">
              <div class="half image-half">
               <a href="/gift-cards">
                <img alt="Minted Gift Cards" src="https://cdn3.minted.com/files/content/minted_landing_banners/2019_Q1_1_31_Giftcard_v2A_OP.png"/>
               </a>
              </div>
              <div class="half content-half">
               <div class="pane wide">
                <h2>
